Aatrox.name: Aatrox
Aatrox.title: the Darkin Blade
Aatrox.blurb: Aatrox is a legendary warrior, one of only five that remain of an ancient race known as the Darkin. He wields his massive blade with grace and poise, slicing through legions in a style that is hypnotic to behold. With each foe felled, Aatrox's ...
